item.title: REDtalks #17 - Orchestration 2.0 (w/ a side of bacon)
item.description: GreetingÂ automators and welcome to edisode #17 of REDtalks. Today’s guest is Tyler Hatton who is from WWTs own internal IT Operations team. Tyler is the F5 BIG-IP Subject Matter Expert for WWT and is hell-bent on replacing the mundane with declarative interfaces and orchestration systems.

item.title: REDtalks #15 - Jason Hand on Getting started with ChatOps
item.description: Episode #15 brings us the topic of ChatOps. No, I’m not talking about late nights dialed into bulletin board chat groups on your 9600 bit/s modem! ChatOps is about cross team collaboration and information sharing.
